page.title: 17Health
page.content: The health care in our D block is reasonable. On Greasby Rd there is a health centre; inside the health centre there are three doctors, two men and one woman,there are two waiting rooms where you wait for the doctors to finish with their patients that were before you,the doctors then give you a prescription for you to take to the chemist across the road. They give you a bottle of medicine or pills, cream or anything that is written on the prescription.If problems arise wit your teeth there are two dentists over the Spar shop and some dentists in the health centre,the dentists can fill in your teeth if you have got a hole in it and it is causing great pain they sit you in a chair which can move up or down. This gets the dentist into a better position to fix your teeth.....
